languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, ткачи Кровавой паутины наблюдали, выслеживали и убивали врагов фон Валанциус задолго до того, как Торговый Патент перешел Леди Теодоре. Однако известны и случаи, когда их клинок обрывал жизнь весьма порядочных людей". {n}Фактотум нервно сглатывает, бросая мимолетный взгляд на Кибеллу.{/n} "Но, безусловно, я ни в коей мере не осуждаю деяния многоуважаемого культа... Наверняка тому была веская причина..."

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, ткачи Кровавой паутины наблюдали, выслеживали и убивали врагов фон Валанциус задолго до того, как Торговый Патент перешел Леди Теодоре. Однако известны и случаи, когда их клинок обрывал жизнь весьма порядочных людей". {n}Фактотум нервно сглатывает, бросая мимолетный взгляд на Кибеллу.{/n} "Но, безусловно, я ни в коей мере не осуждаю деяния многоуважаемого культа... Наверняка тому была веская причина..."

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the spinners of the Bloodspun Web were watching, tracking, and killing von Valancius enemies long before the Warrant of Trade passed to Lady Theodora. However, their blade has also been known to cut short the lives of highly upstanding persons." {n}The Factotum swallows nervously, casting a fleeting glance at Kibellah.{/n} "But I certainly do not in any way condemn the deeds of the deeply esteemed cult... I am sure they must have had good reason..."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, ткачи Кровавой паутины наблюдали, выслеживали и убивали врагов фон Валанциус задолго до того, как Торговый Патент перешел Леди Теодоре. Однако известны и случаи, когда их клинок обрывал жизнь весьма порядочных людей". {n}Фактотум нервно сглатывает, бросая мимолетный взгляд на Кибеллу.{/n} "Но, безусловно, я ни в коей мере не осуждаю деяния многоуважаемого культа... Наверняка тому была веская причина..."

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the spinners of the Bloodspun Web were watching, tracking, and killing von Valancius enemies long before the Warrant of Trade passed to Lady Theodora. However, their blade has also been known to cut short the lives of highly upstanding persons." {n}The Factotum swallows nervously, casting a fleeting glance at Kibellah.{/n} "But I certainly do not in any way condemn the deeds of the deeply esteemed cult.... I am sure they must have had good reason..."

"Lord Captain, the Bloodspun Web cult are faithful servants of your dynasty. They had identified, tracked, and killed enemies of House von Valancius in the bowels of the flagship long before the Warrant of Trade passed to Lady Theodora."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the spinners of the Bloodspun Web were watching, tracking, and killing von Valancius enemies long before the Warrant of Trade passed to Lady Theodora. However, their blade has also been known to cut short the lives of highly upstanding persons." {n}The Factotum swallows nervously, casting a fleeting glance at Kibellah.{/n} "But I certainly do not in any way condemn the deeds of the deeply esteemed cult.... I am sure they must have had good reason..."

"Lord Captain, the Cult of the Bloodspun Web are faithful servants of your dynasty. They dwelled within the depths of this flagship long before the Warrant of Trade passed to Lady Theodora. They make it their purpose to identify, track down, and kill the enemies of House von Valancius."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the spinners of the Bloodspun Web were watching, tracking, and killing von Valancius enemies long before the Warrant of Trade passed to Lady Theodora. However, their blade has also been known to cut short the lives of highly upstanding persons." {n}The Factotum swallows nervously, casting a fleeting glance at Kibellah.{/n} "But I certainly do not in any way condemn the deeds of the deeply esteemed cult... I am sure they must have had good reason..."

However, their blade has also been known to cut short the lives of highly upstanding persons." {n}The Factotum swallows nervously, casting a fleeting glance at Kibellah.{/n} "But I certainly do not in any way condemn the deeds of the deeply esteemed cult.... I am sure they must have had good reason..."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the spinners of the Bloodspun Web were watching, tracking, and killing von Valancius enemies long before the Warrant of Trade passed to Lady Theodora. However, their blade has also been known to cut short the lives of highly upstanding persons." {n}The Factotum swallows nervously, casting a fleeting glance at Kibellah.{/n} "But I certainly do not in any way condemn the deeds of the deeply esteemed cult... I am sure they must have had good reason..."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, les tisseurs de la Toile de Sang guettaient, traquaient et éliminaient déjà les ennemis de la dynastie von Valancius bien avant que la lettre de marque ne soit transmise à dame Théodora. Pour autant, il est déjà arrivé que leurs lames abrègent l'existence d'individus dont l'intégrité ne faisait aucun doute. » {n}Le factotum déglutit nerveusement et jette un bref regard en direction de Kibellah.{/n} « Cela étant dit, loin de moi l'idée de condamner les agissements d'un culte aussi révéré... Ils avaient sans doute de bonnes raisons d'agir ainsi... »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the spinners of the Bloodspun Web were watching, tracking, and killing von Valancius enemies long before the Warrant of Trade passed to Lady Theodora. However, their blade has also been known to cut short the lives of highly upstanding persons." {n}The Factotum swallows nervously, casting a fleeting glance at Kibellah.{/n} "But I certainly do not in any way condemn the deeds of the deeply esteemed cult... I am sure they must have had good reason..."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, les tisseurs de la Toile de Sang guettaient, traquaient et éliminaient déjà les ennemis de la dynastie von Valancius bien avant que la lettre de marque ne soit transmise à dame Théodora. Pour autant, il est déjà arrivé que leurs lames abrègent l'existence d'individus dont l'intégrité ne faisait aucun doute. » {n}Le factotum déglutit nerveusement et jette un bref regard en direction de Kibellah.{/n} « Cela étant dit, loin de moi l'idée de condamner les agissements d'un culte aussi révéré... Ils avaient sans doute de bonnes raisons d'agir ainsi... »

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, los tejedores de la Red Sanguinolenta ya estaban vigilando, rastreando y eliminando a los enemigos de los von Valancius mucho antes de que la Patente de Comercio llegara a manos de lady Theodora. Pero en ocasiones sus puñales también han segado las vidas de individuos sumamente distinguidos». {n}El Factótum traga saliva y echa una mirada de reojo a Kibellah.{/n} «Pero nada más lejos de mi intención que censurar las hazañas del estimado culto... No me cabe ninguna duda de que tenían razones de peso».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the spinners of the Bloodspun Web were watching, tracking, and killing von Valancius enemies long before the Warrant of Trade passed to Lady Theodora. However, their blade has also been known to cut short the lives of highly upstanding persons." {n}The Factotum swallows nervously, casting a fleeting glance at Kibellah.{/n} "But I certainly do not in any way condemn the deeds of the deeply esteemed cult... I am sure they must have had good reason..."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, los tejedores de la Red Sanguinolenta ya estaban vigilando, rastreando y eliminando a los enemigos de los von Valancius mucho antes de que la Patente de Comercio llegara a manos de lady Theodora. Pero en ocasiones sus puñales también han segado las vidas de individuos sumamente distinguidos». {n}El Factótum traga saliva y echa una mirada de reojo a Kibellah.{/n} «Pero nada más lejos de mi intención que censurar las hazañas del estimado culto... No me cabe ninguna duda de que tenían razones de peso».

languages.text: “大人，早在西奥多拉夫人继承贸易授状之前，织血罗网的织网者就一直在监视、追击、消灭冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的敌人。然而，众所周知，他们的利刃同样会夺走身居高位之人的性命。”{n}高阶顾问紧张地咽着口水，瞥了绮贝菈一眼。{/n}“但毫无疑问，我绝对不会以任何方式谴责这支备受尊重的教派……我相信，他们的所作所为一定有着非常充分的理由……”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the spinners of the Bloodspun Web were watching, tracking, and killing von Valancius enemies long before the Warrant of Trade passed to Lady Theodora. However, their blade has also been known to cut short the lives of highly upstanding persons." {n}The Factotum swallows nervously, casting a fleeting glance at Kibellah.{/n} "But I certainly do not in any way condemn the deeds of the deeply esteemed cult... I am sure they must have had good reason..."

traits.locale_text: “大人，早在西奥多拉夫人继承贸易授状之前，织血罗网的织网者就一直在监视、追击、消灭冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的敌人。然而，众所周知，他们的利刃同样会夺走身居高位之人的性命。”{n}高阶顾问紧张地咽着口水，瞥了绮贝菈一眼。{/n}“但毫无疑问，我绝对不会以任何方式谴责这支备受尊重的教派……我相信，他们的所作所为一定有着非常充分的理由……”

languages.text: 「陛下、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの織り手は、シオドーラ様に通商許可証が渡るずっと前から、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の敵を監視し、追跡し、殺してきました。ですが、その刃は高潔な人物の命を縮めることでも知られています」{n}ファクトタムは緊張したように息を飲み込み、キベラに一瞬視線を送る。{/n}「ですが、深く敬われている教団の行為を非難するつもりは毛頭ありません。彼らにはきちんとした理由があったのでしょう…」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the spinners of the Bloodspun Web were watching, tracking, and killing von Valancius enemies long before the Warrant of Trade passed to Lady Theodora. However, their blade has also been known to cut short the lives of highly upstanding persons." {n}The Factotum swallows nervously, casting a fleeting glance at Kibellah.{/n} "But I certainly do not in any way condemn the deeds of the deeply esteemed cult... I am sure they must have had good reason..."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの織り手は、シオドーラ様に通商保証書が渡るずっと前から、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の敵を監視し、追跡し、殺してきました。ですが、その刃は高潔な人物の命を知事めることでも知られています」{n}ファクトタムは緊張したように息を飲み込み、キベラに一瞬視線を送る。{/n}「ですが、深く敬われている教団の行為を非難するつもりは毛頭ありません。彼らにはきちんとした理由があったのでしょう…」

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, die Spinner des Blutgesponnenen Netzes haben die Feinde derer von Valancius schon beobachtet, verfolgt und getötet, lange bevor Lady Theodora den Handelsbrief erhielt. Allerdings haben ihre Klingen auch dem Leben aufrechter Personen ein Ende gemacht." {n}Das Faktotum schluckt nervös und wirft Kibellah einen flüchtigen Blick zu.{/n}"Aber ich verurteile die Taten des hochgeschätzten Kultes in keiner Weise ... Ich bin sicher, sie hatten gute Gründe ..."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the spinners of the Bloodspun Web were watching, tracking, and killing von Valancius enemies long before the Warrant of Trade passed to Lady Theodora. However, their blade has also been known to cut short the lives of highly upstanding persons." {n}The Factotum swallows nervously, casting a fleeting glance at Kibellah.{/n} "But I certainly do not in any way condemn the deeds of the deeply esteemed cult... I am sure they must have had good reason..."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, die Spinner des Blutgesponnenen Netzes haben die Feinde derer von Valancius schon beobachtet, verfolgt und getötet, lange bevor Lady Theodora den Handelsbrief erhielt. Allerdings haben ihre Klingen auch dem Leben aufrechter Personen ein Ende gemacht." {n}Das Faktotum schluckt nervös und wirft Kibellah einen flüchtigen Blick zu.{/n}"Aber ich verurteile die Taten des hochgeschätzten Kultes in keiner Weise ... Ich bin sicher, sie hatten gute Gründe ..."

languages.text: "Ticari Ruhsatname'nin Leydi Theodora'nın himayesine geçmesinden önce bile Kanipi Ağı dokurları; von Valancius düşmanlarını gözlemliyor, takip ediyor ve öldürüyordu {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Ancak kılıçlarının bir hayli seçkin kişilerin yaşamlarını kısa kestiği de bilinir." {n}Kâhya, gergin bir şekilde yutkunuyor. Kibellah'ya kısa bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Fakat son derece muhterem tarikatın eylemlerini hiçbir şekilde kınamıyorum. Geçerli nedenleri olduğuna eminim..."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the spinners of the Bloodspun Web were watching, tracking, and killing von Valancius enemies long before the Warrant of Trade passed to Lady Theodora. However, their blade has also been known to cut short the lives of highly upstanding persons." {n}The Factotum swallows nervously, casting a fleeting glance at Kibellah.{/n} "But I certainly do not in any way condemn the deeds of the deeply esteemed cult... I am sure they must have had good reason..."
